Why ban guns? It's not the guns that do the shooting it's the mentally ill or confused people who pull the trigger. After guns there are other things, bow and arrows, sledge hammers, box cutters, axes, saws, knives, crowbars, feet and hands, ropes, and etc. It's time to admit that some folks through no fault of their own have mental health and psychological problems. We need tougher mental health screening. What good does it do to ban guns when we all know that the criminals will always find a way to get a gun while the responsible people will be unable to defend themselves. The first line of our defense is ourselves. The 2nd amendment was written so that we could defend ourselves from governments just like the one that we the people are suffering under as well as those individuals that are intent upon causing grave harm to others.

No religion on Earth has ever been progressive, nor has there been any scientific influence that helped improving human lives by adding any technologic value to World civilization except, their self-righteous doctrines, and social and moral rules. It was ancient Greek and Egypt, 5000 - 1000 BC, long before Islam, which provided the first blueprints of engineering for modern civilization, and the apparatus that helped men to build temples, cities, roads, and aqua docks. So, Al Jazeera, check your schooling again.

I truly believe that our Government is trying to divide us .Some might think it sounds crazy but if you divide the population you break it. Thus it is easier for those at the top to have greater control over all of us . Someday soon I believe we will come see the reality of this. United we stand divided we fall. This way how can the masses work together when Uncle Sam becomes totalitarian : a system of government that is centralized and dictatorial and requires complete subservience to the state. Sounds like what DC wants to do to us pawns.
